message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $150 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand that you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $130.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm getting a bit concerned that I might not be able to find a better deal elsewhere. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $128.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not sure I'm willing to pay that much. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that I won't be able to reach a deal with you, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now willing to sell the product to you for $125.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to make a serious offer: I'll pay $105 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can reach a deal.
